targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    IF(`rank` <= 10, company, 'Others') AS Company,
    SUM(occurrences) AS Count
FROM (
    SELECT
        company,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS `rank`,
        COUNT(*) AS occurrences
    FROM (
        SELECT
            node_id,
            company
        FROM
            contributors
        WHERE
            repo_name IN ($repos) AND company <> '' AND company IS NOT NULL
        GROUP BY
            node_id, company
    ) AS unique_contributors
    GROUP BY
        company
) AS ranked_locations
GROUP BY
    IF(`rank` <= 10, company, 'Others')
ORDER BY
    SUM(occurrences) DESC;

SELECT
    IF(`rank` <= 10, location, 'Others') AS Location,
    SUM(occurrences) AS Count
FROM (
    SELECT
        location,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS `rank`,
        COUNT(*) AS occurrences
    FROM (
        SELECT
            node_id,
            location
        FROM
            openalysis.contributors
        WHERE
            repo_name IN ($repos) AND location <> '' AND location IS NOT NULL
        GROUP BY
            node_id, location
    ) AS unique_contributors
    GROUP BY
        location
) AS ranked_locations
GROUP BY
    IF(`rank` <= 10, location, 'Others')
ORDER BY
    SUM(occurrences) DESC;

WITH first_contributions AS (
    SELECT
        login,
        org_login,
        MIN(created_at) AS first_contribution_date
    FROM
        openalysis.analyzed_org_contributions
    WHERE
        org_login = '$login'
        AND created_at >= $__timeFrom()
        AND created_at <= $__timeTo()
    GROUP BY
        login, org_login
),
last_contributions AS (
    SELECT
        login,
        org_login,
        MAX(created_at) AS last_contribution_date
    FROM
        openalysis.analyzed_org_contributions
    WHERE
        org_login = '$login'
        AND created_at >= $__timeFrom()
        AND created_at <= $__timeTo()
    GROUP BY
        login, org_login
),
first_contributions_details AS (
    SELECT
        fc.login,
        fc.org_login,
        c.contributions AS first_contributions
    FROM
        first_contributions fc
    JOIN
        openalysis.analyzed_org_contributions c
    ON
        fc.login = c.login
        AND fc.org_login = c.org_login
        AND fc.first_contribution_date = c.created_at
),
last_contributions_details AS (
    SELECT
        lc.login,
        lc.org_login,
        c.contributions AS last_contributions
    FROM
        last_contributions lc
    JOIN
        openalysis.analyzed_org_contributions c
    ON
        lc.login = c.login
        AND lc.org_login = c.org_login
        AND lc.last_contribution_date = c.created_at
)
SELECT
    fcd.login AS `Login`,
    (lcd.last_contributions - fcd.first_contributions) AS `Ranged Contributions`,
    lcd.last_contributions AS `Total Contributions`
FROM
    first_contributions_details fcd
JOIN
    last_contributions_details lcd
ON
    fcd.login = lcd.login
    AND fcd.org_login = lcd.org_login
ORDER BY
    `Ranged Contributions` DESC;

SELECT
    star_count as `Count`,
    created_at as `Created At`
FROM openalysis.organizations
WHERE login = '$login';

SELECT
    contributor_count as `Count`,
    created_at as `Created At`
FROM openalysis.organizations
WHERE login = '$login';

SELECT
    issue_count as `Count`,
    created_at as `Created At`
FROM openalysis.organizations
WHERE login = '$login';

SELECT
    pull_request_count as `Count`,
    created_at as `Created At`
FROM openalysis.organizations
WHERE login = '$login';

    created_at as `Created At`

WHERE login = '$login';

SELECT
  assignee_login as `Assignee`,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(issue_repo_name, '/', -1) as `Repo`,
  issue_url as `Issue URL`,
  issue_number as `Issue ID`
FROM
  openalysis.issue_assignees
WHERE
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(issue_repo_name, '/', -1) IN ($repos);

SELECT
  assignee_login as `Assignee`,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(pull_request_repo_name, '/', -1) as `Repo`,
  pull_request_url as `Issue URL`,
  pull_request_number as `Issue ID`
FROM
  openalysis.pull_request_assignees
WHERE
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(pull_request_repo_name, '/', -1) IN ($repos);

SELECT
    name AS `Repo`,
    star_count AS `Count`,
    created_at AS `Created At`
FROM openalysis.repositories
WHERE name IN ($repos);

SELECT
    name AS `Repo`,
    contributor_count AS `Count`,
    created_at AS `Created At`
FROM openalysis.repositories
WHERE name IN ($repos);

SELECT
    name AS `Repo`,
    fork_count AS `Count`,
    created_at AS `Created At`
FROM openalysis.repositories
WHERE name IN ($repos);

SELECT
    name AS `Repo`,
    issue_count AS `Count`,
    created_at AS `Created At`
FROM openalysis.repositories
WHERE name IN ($repos);

SELECT
    name AS `Repo`,
    pull_request_count AS `Count`,
    created_at AS `Created At`
FROM openalysis.repositories
WHERE name IN ($repos);
